body.title: Project Description
body.text:
Throughout my experience at Neolink, I participated in the development of their tool NeoGestion towards departmental councils.

This solution, launched in 2020 in collaboration with the Bas-Rhin Departmental Council, proposes a comprehensive and seamless approach that takes into account all the potential and dimensions of RSA beneficiaries and Department partners.

NeoGestion allows all stakeholders to share their information about the beneficiary, for a more coherent and needs-based support for each person in a vulnerable social situation.

body.title: Main Features of NeoGestion
body.text:
• Data retrieval
  • Simplified and coordinated exchanges
  • Online, comprehensive, and seamless monitoring
  • Conducting a complete socio-professional diagnosis
  • Simplified access to job return schemes
  • Optimization of appointment scheduling
  • Digitalization of CER
  • Production of necessary indicators
